name: CLM_TX_HX_MODIFIERS
description: This table stores the history of a service line's procedure modifiers for a given claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PIECE
columns.description: The piece in the delimited group that the procedure modifier came from.

columns.name: MODIFIER_ID
columns.description: A procedure modifier that was on one of the service lines of the claim.

columns.name: MODIFIER_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.
